p.d: Having come to write an article on the orchard, a tourism journalist moves into the cottage. Rita sees a unique opportunity to make the property better known. But before that she will have to sing the praises of the orchard and its owner, Lomer... Directed by: Jean-Marc Piché (season 1, Canada, 2017) Screenplay: Patricia Léger Cast: Patricia Léger (Rita Melanson), Marie-Jo Thério (Yolande LeBlanc), Marcel-Romain Thériault (Lomer Dupuis), Marc Lamontagne (Edmour LeBlanc), Raphaël Butler (Ferraille Gaudet), Claire Normand (Gilberte Cormier), Gabriel Robichaud (Zoël Bourgeois), Bianca Richard (Terri Cormier) Genre: comedy
